fargo.neighborhoods: Downtown, Lindenwood, North Fargo, South Fargo
fargo.meetingHighlights: Largest AA community in the state with many downtown and suburban meetings, frequent speaker nights, and strong newcomer resources.
fargo.transitInfo: MATBUS provides local transit; Hector International Airport (FAR) serves regional flights.

bismarck.neighborhoods: Downtown, South Bismarck, North Bismarck, Kirkwood
bismarck.meetingHighlights: Capital-city meetings with steady weekday and evening attendance and active fellowship in nearby Mandan.
bismarck.transitInfo: Bis-Man Transit provides local routes; Bismarck Municipal Airport serves regional flights.

grand-forks.areaDescription: Grand Forks area (University of North Dakota nearby)
grand-forks.meetingHighlights: University-influenced meetings and community groups with both daytime and evening schedules.
grand-forks.transitInfo: Cities Area Transit provides local buses; Grand Forks International Airport serves regional routes.

minot.meetingHighlights: Active community meetings with regular newcomer and step-study groups and strong local fellowship.
minot.transitInfo: Minot City Transit and regional highways; Minot International Airport for regional flights.

west-fargo.neighborhoods: Downtown West Fargo, Sheyenne River Valley
west-fargo.meetingHighlights: Suburban meetings serving commuters and families; many evening options and newcomer support shared with Fargo groups.
west-fargo.transitInfo: MATBUS connects West Fargo with Fargo; highway access via I-94.
